text: Tumhi sanga, ‘‘amhi allahavara ani je kahi amacyavara utaravile gele ahe ani je ibrahima ani isma'ila ani yakuba ani tyancya santativara utaravile gele ani je kahi musa ani isa ani itara paigabaranna allahacya tarphe pradana kele gele tya sarvanvara imana (visvasa) rakhalee,amhi tyancyapaiki konacyahi daramyana pharaka karita nahi ani amhi sarvasrestha allahace ajnadharaka ahota.’’
